utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on Joey!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach, I told you everything I knew last night! Look, it's not that big of a deal, so Monica and Chandler are doing it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't believe you would say that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sorry. Monica and Chandler are making love.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! I mean come on! This is a huge deal! Fine I want—I need more details, who-who initiated the first kiss?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Is he romantic with her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are they in love?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You don't know anything.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, I know one thing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They did it right there on the couch.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-yeah. Hey Gunther, can I have a scone please? Wanna hear some good news? Someone I know is getting married! Yeah! And weddings are happy occasions! Oh, by-the-by it's my ex-wife Emily!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What? Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sorry man.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Here's your scone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thanks Gunther. STUPID BRITISH SNACK FOOD!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did they teach you that in your anger management class?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, you know what might help you deal with it? Think of it this way, you and Emily are in the past and you can't be mad about the past. So are you still mad about the Louisiana Purchase?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pheebs, I don’t think anyone's mad about that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Exactly! Because it's in the past!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Anybody gonna eat that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look at us all dressed up for the big office party! By the way, what are we celebrating?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, we had a lot of liquor left over from the Christmas party.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think this is so cool because none of our friends are here and we can be a real couple. We don't have to hide.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, I can do this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh, and I can do this.

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: We can't do that.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Hey Bing! Wo-ho-ho, who's the pretty lady and what the hell is she doing with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I asked myself that very question, sir. Uh, this is Monica. This is my boss, Doug. Doug this is Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, nice to meet you!

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Hi! And this is my wife Kara.

utterance.speaker: Kara
utterance.content: Nice to meet you Monica. Bing!

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Say uh, Bing, did you hear about the new law firm we got working for us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, sir.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Yeah, Dewey, Cheatum, and Howe.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Come on honey, let's go drink our body weight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What was that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That noise you just made?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that was my work laugh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? Your work laugh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, believe me, to survive this party, you're gonna have to come up with one too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, check me out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: …says $30 Father; same as in town.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Everybody at work loved you last night!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And! They like me more just because I was with ya! I think you repaired a lot of the damage from when they met Joey. And Doug wants us to play tennis with them. He's never even talked to me outside of work. Except for that time when we bumped into each other at that strip club. Strip church. Anyway, I'm gonna go try and find a racquet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, I thought you already had one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh I used too, but then Joey thought it would be fun to go to Central Park and hit rocks at…bigger rocks. Hey Rach, do you have a tennis racquet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh umm, y'know I lent it to Joey and I never actually got it back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, good luck with that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's up?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing here? I thought you had to do inventory all day.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well yeah, I do, but I decided to take a long lunch and spend some time with my friend Monica. Y'know I-I feel that we don't talk anymore. How are you? What is new with you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uhh, not much. Uh, work's good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh y'know what, we don’t have to talk about work. We can talk about anything!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Umm…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Y'know what? Let's talk about relationships!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, what's going on with you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing! You go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I-I—there was this guy at the bank that I thought was cute umm, but I don't anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow that's uh, juicy. Umm, y'know what though Mon, I actually do have a lot of work to do so if-if—are you sure there's just not anything else?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, I'm sure! Rachel is there something that you want to talk me about?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! If there was I wouldn't tell you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, then what happened?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh. Uh-huh. Uh-huh. You'll get your turn!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, what's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing! This is not over!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was up all night writing this really nasty letter to Emily! It was perfect and now it's all covered in-in… Actually, thanks!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Everybody ready to go to the movies?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh actually, I think I'm gonna skip it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm gonna stay and read my book. I just wanna be alone right now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Are you sure you don't want to come? Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, they get mail and stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's okay, Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, let's go Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Bing!

utterance.speaker: Kara
utterance.content: Oww!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Game!

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Well, I gotta tell ya Bing; that partner of yours is a real tiger. Are you all right sweethart?

utterance.speaker: Kara
utterance.content: I'm not all right.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: We're, we're just gonna get a little sip of water.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Am I on fire today or what?! Those birds are browned, basted, and ready to be carved!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, easy Martina. I think we should let them win the next game.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I don't understand what you just said.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let them win one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you crazy?! We own those two! I mean look at 'um, he can't breath and she's popping pills.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're not even giving them a chance!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They have racquets don't they?!

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Uh Bing, I think we're gonna make this the last game.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes, sir! Put me out of my misery. Are you sure you never played pro? Please let them win!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll take it down to 95% but that's the best I can do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oopsey, missed it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got it!

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Nice shot.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got it!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Long!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe you let them win!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, at least you hid your feelings well about it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I was frustrated.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It was my racquet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I was frustrated with you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If we hadn't lost the game they never would've invented us to dinner tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what really bothers me? Is—it's how-how different you act around them! I mean y'know the throwing the tennis games, the fake laugh, the "I'll see you around, Bing!" "Not if I see you first, Doug!" I gotta tell you, I don't like Work Chandler. Okay? The guy's a suck-up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay y'know what, because you said that, I'm not putting out tonight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm telling you, something's wrong! My brother does not stay out all night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe we should check the trash chute.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross couldn't fit down the trash chute.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's right, he almost could. Which is exactly how I got stuck there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There he is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Where the hell have you been?!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just, y'know out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, out, oh God, I don't know why we didn't think to check there!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What were you doing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I uh, went to a bar. And then I just uh, just walked around for a while.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You walked around all night in the city by yourself?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He hooked up! He hooked up with someone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I don't have to answer your questions! Okay? I'm a big boy, I can do whatever I want!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He hooked up!! Tell us about her!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Ross you left you scarf in… Hey you guys.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Uh-oh-okay. Uh-oh-okay. I know what you all are thinking. But Chandler is in Yemen! I'm a young woman! I have needs! I can't wait forever!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! No that's what I was thinking.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: So I'm asking you please, take a moment before you judge me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, nobody's judging you.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh! Okay! You, Mister Right Place at the Right Time, call me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, look, I-I know what you guys are going to say…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You two will have very hairy children.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I didn't know you would say that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! Janice?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, hold on! Hold on. Hold on. This is Ross, okay? He's our friend. He obviously went crazy. He obviously lost his mind.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I didn't lose my mind! Okay, Janice and I have a lot in common! We've-we've both been divorced. We-we both have kids.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So are you actually gonna see her again?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Phoebe! Don't put ideas in his head!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am gonna see her again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit Phoebe!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I have to tell you something that I have never admitted during our entire friendship! But, when we were in high school I made out with James Farrell even when I knew that you liked him! Wow, that feels so good to get off my chest! Okay, you go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: My turn? What-what are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, Monica, I know about you and Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I overheard you guys on the phone the other day, and you said, "I'll just tell Rachel that I'm doing laundry for a couple of hours." And he said, "Laundry? Is that my new nickname?" And you said, "No! You know what your nickname is, Mr. Big."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well. Sounds like you're writing yourself a little play there Rach. Wow! Let me know how that one turns out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I wouldn't know because I got so freaked out that I hung up the phone.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if you had kept listening, you-you would have heard me call him Mr. Big……ot.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Mr. Bigot. He tells the most racist jokes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. So you're telling me that there is nothing going on between you and Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Me and Chandler?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, put your 20 bucks down. First one to find the tasty treat wins. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Let's get the contestants out of their isolation booths. And they're off!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get your foot off my contestant! Judge!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Judge rules, no violation.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? It sounds so weird to say this but, I just had a great day with Janice!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! I opened up to her about all the terrible stuff that's been happening to me. I mean I talked for hours. It is amazing to have someone give you such-such focused attention.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don't need Janice for that, you've got us. We…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And the duck gets the Nutter-Butter!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!! Hey-hey that's not a Nutter-Butter, that's just an old Wonton!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Judge rules, Nutter-Butter.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, tough call.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: But seriously, I believe that we should all support President Clinton. And her husband Bill.

utterance.speaker: Kara
utterance.content: So how do you kids like your coffee?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, none for me. Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just a little bit of sugar.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Well, maybe I'll bring it out and have Monica stick her finger in it. That oughta sweeten it up, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How does that laugh not give you a headache?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, you get used to it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know, I-I-I don't think that I can. So if you don't mind, maybe this will be it for me on the work things.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So I laugh at my boss's jokes, what's the big deal?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'd rather hang out with a sniveling work weasel guy when I can be hanging out with my boyfriend who I actually respect.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Uh, I gotta apologize for Kara's coffee. Y'know, I feel sorry for it if it ever got in a fight, it's not strong enough to defend itself. Did you hear what I said Bing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: The joke Bing. What's the matter with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I-I just didn't think it was funny sir.

utterance.speaker: Doug
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I just…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, I just don't think that you understood the joke.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! I mean it was really funny, I-I just don't think you got it. You see Kara's coffee is-is-is weak tasting, okay? But-but what Doug was-was imply that it was weak physically. You get it now honey?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think I do! Thank you, Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I thought you could use the help.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Coffee in a fight!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Rach! Hey, you mind if I read my comic books in here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure! Why?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh well, Chandler and Monica are over there and it's kinda hard to concentrate.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! She just called and said that she was gonna be working late! She keeps lying to me! That's it! Y'know what? I'm just gonna go over there and confront them right now!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, so you're telling me that I have to tell racist jokes now?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sorry! I'm just—I'm not very good at this! I'm a terrible liar and I hate having to lie to Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But we're not ready to tell yet!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! It's just that…ever since high school Rachel was the one person I told everything too. Y'know? I miss that so much now. She's my best friend.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey?! Oh my God, Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wh-wh-what are you doing here? (She tries to pull her shirt down to cover the fact that she's wearing men's boxers.]

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I was actually—I-I came over here to-to borrow this lamp. To umm, look at my books, y'know, see them a little better.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great! Umm, well what-what I was doing in Chandler's room is that umm, I was cleaning it! In fact, he pays me to clean it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! What a great way to earn some extra pocket money.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know when I said to you earlier that I was at work umm, I'm at my new work.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's good enough. Right? Okay, well umm, I'm gonna go look at my books!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll get back to my new job.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: 'Kay. Congratulations on your new job.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Man, she is really gullible.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Actually, I should get going.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you sure? Because I can stay out as late as you want. I told you how I'm on sabbatical from work, right?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Yes! Yes! You did!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh…

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: What is wrong now?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This isn't what I ordered! Man! Can anything go right in my life?! First my marriage falls apart and then…

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I know! I know! And then you lose your apartment! And then you lose your job! And then your ex-wife gets married so fast! And now the coffee—ahh!! Ross, we need to talk.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Sometimes I feel…

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: No-no-no, no. I'm going to talk. I believe that the sun has set on our day in the sun.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: You're a very sweet person Ross, umm, unfortunately I don't think I can take another second of you whining!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let-let me make sure I'm hearing this right, you're ending this with me because I'm too whiney? So you're saying, I've become so whiney that I annoy you, Janice.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Well yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OH…MY…GOD!!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Are you gonna be okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am now.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm, hi.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh hi! Well, I guess that's two out of three, Joey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, we got to talk.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just wanted to tell you something before you heard it from someone else and I hope this isn't too weird, but uh, I had uh, a thing with Janice. What you're-you're not mad?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why would I be mad?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, because y'know there are certain rules about this kind of stuff. You don't uh, you don't fool around with your uh, friend's ex-girlfriends or possible girlfriends or girls they're related to.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am mad! But you know what I'm gonna do? I'm gonna forgive you! Because that's what friends do! They forgive their friends when they do everything you just said, all on the list there. Well, but I want you to remember that I forgave you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I also want you to remember that I let you live here rent free!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And, I want you to remember that I gave you twenty seven dollars. No strings attached. Now, if you can't remember that, I think we should write it down—let's write it down!
